description: A water city known for its shipbuilding industry, currently hosting the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies in celebration after the Enies Lobby incident.

keyEvents.title: Garp Spares Luffy at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Garp decides to let Luffy go free while at Water 7, citing family bonds.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Garp's choice between duty and family on the island.

keyEvents.title: Koby and Luffy Reunion at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Koby and Luffy reunite at Water 7 after their separation in Episode 2.
keyEvents.significance: Water 7 serves as the location for this meaningful reunion between former traveling companions.

keyEvents.title: Water 7 Victory Celebration
keyEvents.description: A massive celebration party takes place at the Galley-La Company pool in Water 7, celebrating the Straw Hats' victory and survival.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Enies Lobby arc and shows the bonds between the Straw Hats and Water 7 citizens.

keyEvents.title: Aokiji Confronts Robin at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Admiral Aokiji appears at the celebration in Water 7 to have a private conversation with Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Water 7 becomes the location where Robin receives closure about her past and Aokiji's protection.

statusHistory.reason: Water 7 continues to be inhabited and active as a major shipbuilding hub

description: The premier shipbuilding company in Water 7, featuring a pool area where the Straw Hats and their allies celebrate their victory after Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Victory Celebration at Galley-La Pool
keyEvents.description: A massive party is held at the Galley-La Company pool area with the Straw Hats, Franky Family, Galley-La workers, and Water 7 residents.
keyEvents.significance: The celebration marks the end of the Enies Lobby arc and shows the strong bonds formed during the Water 7 saga.

statusHistory.reason: Galley-La Company continues operations as Water 7's leading shipbuilding company
